content.rendered:
Hello again everyone- I’m back! And this time, with another video.

In this video, I walk through the process of adding with a composition in 3 very simple steps (and under 2 minutes!). You can now add your pipelines to Codefresh using your Docker compose file. Starting with a composition allows you to add all of your services defined in Docker compose in 1 click, and you can immediately run your composition at the end of all builds.
